'''24w14a''' is the fifteenth and final [[snapshot]] for [[Java Edition 1.20.5]], released on April 3, 2024,<ref>{{snap|24w14a|April 3, 2024}}</ref> which fixes bugs.

== Changes ==
=== General ===
'''[[Data pack]]'''
* Version is now <code>38</code>.
* Added <code>replace</code> field to the <code>set_attributes</code> loot function (default: true).
** When false, attributes are appended.
* The <code>text</code> field within filterable entries in book components has been renamed to <code>raw</code> to avoid ambiguity.
* The <code>profile</code> component and fields on player head items and blocks respectively now support resolving from a UUID.
** By specifying the <code>id</code> field without a <code>name</code>, the <code>name</code> and textures are looked up.

'''[[options.txt|{{mono|options.txt}}]]'''
* Removed <code>skipRealms32bitWarning</code>.

'''[[Splash]]es'''
* Changed "Java 16 + 1 = 17!" to "Java 16 + 1 + 4 = 21!".

'''Technical'''
* The game now requires a 64-bit operating system.
* The game now requires Java 21.
* The included Java distribution is now the Microsoft build of OpenJDK 21.0.2.

== Experimental ==
=== Changes ===
'''[[Heavy core]]'''
* Now has the [[pickaxe]] as an appropriate tool.

'''[[Tag]]s'''
* Added <code>heavy_core</code> to the <code>#mineable/pickaxe</code> block tag.
